parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

accountIBAN.description: The International Bank Account Number (IBAN) is an internationally agreed system of identifying bank accounts across national borders. The current standard is ISO 13616:2007. The IBAN consists of up to 34 alphanumeric characters comprising: a country code; two check digits; and a number that includes the domestic bank account number, branch identifier, and potential routing information. The check digits enable a check of the bank account number to confirm its integrity before submitting a transaction.

endToEndReference.description: This field is used for SEPA

chequeNumber.description: The cheque number. Formed as chequeType.accountId.chequeOrDraftNumber. See chequeId

creditorAgentId.description: The identifier of the creditor agent

bookingDate.description: The date on which the entry was generated. Normally, but not necessarily, the actual date at the time the entry is generated, e.g. if the previous day's business is still being processed after midnight, the actual date changes, but the run date is still the previous day.

transactionCurrency.description: The currency in which the transaction is made

amountInAccountCurrency.description: The amount in the currency of the account

creditAccountId.description: The identifier of the credit account

debitAccountId.description: The identifier of the debit account

ultimateDebtor.description: The ultimate debtor of the payment

paymentDetail.description: Identifies the Payment Details to enable the Beneficiary to apply the payment.

purposeId.description: The purpose identifier of the payment or transaction

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
